title: BRIEF-HGL Says Reached Agreement With CEO Henrik Thorup To Commence CEO Transition Process
text:
BRIEF-HGL Says Reached Agreement With CEO Henrik Thorup To Commence CEO Transition Process

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 08, 2019 19:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-HGL Says Reached Agreement With CEO Henrik Thorup To Commence CEO Transition Process Oct 8 (Reuters) - HGL Ltd : * REACHED AN AGREEMENT WITH CEO HENRIK THORUP TO COMMENCE A CEO TRANSITION PROCESS AFTER BEING INFORMED OF HIS INTENTION TO STEP DOWN * BOARD HAS COMMENCED A COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH TO FIND THORUP'S SUCCESSOR * THORUP HAS COMMITTED TO STAY IN ROLE UNTIL A NEW CEO IS APPOINTED

BRIEF-HGL Says Reached Agreement With CEO Henrik Thorup To Commence CEO Transition Process
description: BRIEF-HGL Says Reached Agreement With CEO Henrik Thorup To Commence CEO Transition Process
